hicpp-uppercase-literal-suffix.description:
Description

The hicpp-uppercase-literal-suffix check is an alias, please see
readability-uppercase-literal-suffix
for more information.

Partially implements
rule 4.2.1
to ensure that the
U
suffix is writeln properly.
hicpp-uppercase-literal-suffix.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
